citations.narrative:
In the room housing 11 rabbits, there was accumulation of rabbit fur covering various surfaces. The premise must be kept
clean to facilitate husbandry practices required by this subpart. Rabbit fur must be removed at regular intervals to
maintain cleanliness. Correct by 11/17/2023.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with an IACUC representative.
n

narrative:
3.56(c) 
   
Sanitation. 
In the room housing 11 rabbits, there was accumulation of rabbit fur covering various surfaces. The premise must be kept 
clean to facilitate husbandry practices required by this subpart. Rabbit fur must be removed at regular intervals to 
maintain cleanliness. Correct by 11/17/2023. 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with an IACUC representative. 
 
 n
